name: Compurrison
description:
Enjoy a relaxing 2D puzzle game by comparing two adorable cats that could not be any more different. By observing and interacting with them, find their only common behavior and snap a picture before it's too late!

Features: 

  • Four cute, animated cats with their own personality 
  • Every cat combination has exactly one reaction in common
  • A total of 6 puzzle levels to enjoy
  • One hint per level to help you! 
  • A small tutorial. 

This game was created by a team of 8 students in one week during the ISART DIGITAL Game Week 2021.

Game programming 

Alexis Gaborit (https://abzje.itch.io/)

Game art

Coralie Gourjon

Game design 

Lisa Jaugey (https://twitter.com/graytonic)

Feel free to play the game and leave some feedback in the comments :)!
